definition: appearance/portrait/picture/government minister/(physics) phase/(literary) to appraise (esp. by scrutinizing physical features)/to read sb's fortune (by physiognomy, palmistry etc)
each other/one another/mutually/fret on the neck of a pipa 琵琶[pi2 pa5] (a fret on the soundboard is called a 品[pin3])

sentences.english: Eva's wedding album holds only a faint glimmer of the wedding itself.
sentences.chinese: 埃娃的結婚相冊僅僅保存了婚禮本身闇弱的影像。

sentences.english: It is like your future photo album.
sentences.chinese: 它就像是你未來的相冊。

sentences.english: The second function of your album is allowing the user to click on a thumbnail and get a blown-up version of the photo.
sentences.chinese: 相冊的第二項功能是允許用戶單擊縮略圖來查看全圖。

sentences.english: Looking through the Akashic records is like leafing through an infinite mental photo album.
sentences.chinese: 察看阿卡西記錄就像翻閱一本無限的精神相冊一樣。

sentences.english: In the immediate aftermath of his death, the children made a dad-book of photos and drawings.
sentences.chinese: 得知父親的死訊，孩子們做了一本爸爸相冊和畫冊。

sentences.english: It will have a private web album section where pictures will be loaded.
sentences.chinese: 這將有一個私人網絡相冊裏的圖片部分將被加載。

sentences.english: I recommand this album in order to remind men sit in front computer to make yourself dressed well.
sentences.chinese: 借這個相冊提醒電腦前的男士，注意打扮好自己。

sentences.english: Welcome to my online photo galleries.
sentences.chinese: 歡迎你訪問我的網上相冊。

sentences.english: Album cut from the 1989 XTC album Oranges & Lemons.
sentences.chinese: 從1989年XTC專輯橙子和檸檬切開的相冊。

sentences.english: All user-entered album data is stored in XML.
sentences.chinese: 所有的用戶輸入的相冊數據以XML形式儲存。

sentences.english: Grab the tub of photos and start putting them in photo albums.
sentences.chinese: 把那些照片拿出來放進相冊裏吧。

sentences.english: Mash-up albums and videos have been a huge hit on the internet.
sentences.chinese: 嘻哈的相冊和錄像對互聯網是個巨大的衝擊。

sentences.english: More than half say they have replaced traditional photo albums with online photo-sharing services.
sentences.chinese: 超過一半媽媽稱已經用網絡相冊代替傳統像冊。

sentences.english: Traditional painting also is done in albums and on walls, lacquerwork, and other media.
sentences.chinese: 傳統繪畫也做了相冊及在牆上，漆器，和其他媒體。

sentences.english: MT2 Thumbnailer (Make Thumbnails 2) is another program for generating HTML photo albums from pictures.
sentences.chinese: 是另一個程序，用於從照片中生成HTML相冊。

definition: original poster (in an online forum)/landlord of a building (traditional)
to stick/to paste/to post (e.g. on a blog)/to keep close to/to fit snugly/to subsidize/allowance (e.g. money for food or housing)/sticker/classifier for sticking plaster: strip
It is said that ... (at the start of a narrative)/to discuss/to recount

(of the sun) to shine on/to bask in (the sunshine)/to dry (clothes, grain etc) in the sun/(fig.) to expose and share (one's experiences and thoughts) on the Web (loanword from "share")/(coll.) to give the cold shoulder to
mythical horse/Internet slang for 什麼|什么[shen2 me5]
to form/to organize/group/team/classifier for sets, series, groups of people, batteries
